articles.title: Crispin Odey to leave hedge fund after sexual misconduct claims, partners say - BBC
articles.description: Crispin Odey, a prominent hedge fund boss, strenuously denies the allegations.
articles.content:
Partners at a prominent finance firm have said its founder, Crispin Odey, is leaving after sexual harassment allegations.
